name: posting:default:visibility
description: Description: Default visibility for new posts. Equivalent to CredentialAccount#source[privacy].

name: posting:default:sensitive
description: Description: Default sensitivity flag for new posts. Equivalent to CredentialAccount#source[sensitive].

name: posting:default:language
type: Type: NULLABLE String (ISO 639-1 language two-letter code), or null
description: Description: Default language for new posts. Equivalent to CredentialAccount#source[language]

name: reading:expand:media
description: Description: Whether media attachments should be automatically displayed or blurred/hidden.

name: reading:expand:spoilers
description: Description: Whether CWs should be expanded by default.
